        boolean canMove(int i,
                int j,
                int dir)
        check if the character can move from her current location to the selected direction
        Parameters:
        i - the i coordinate of the character
        j - the j coordinate of the character
        dir - the direction the character want to move
        Returns:
        returns true if it can move to the direction and false if it doesn't
